div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1490005716471 vc_row-has-fill vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-o-content-middle vc_row-flex

div.h6: Los Olivos Elementary School was established on October 4, 1888.

Music, Art, Inquiry Science, Garden and Digital
Learning
Our school has received the prestigious Blue Ribbon Award!

img.alt: Miss Watkins and our kindergarten superhero graduates at the kindergarten celebration. Congratulations to our kinder students for completing their first year of school! #lo_spartans
img.title: Miss Watkins and our kindergarten superhero graduates at the kindergarten celebration. Congratulations to our kinder students for completing their first year of school! #lo_spartans

img.alt: Los Olivos students signing in this year’s opening song of our Spring Sing! The students once again did a fantastic job. #lo_spartans
img.title: Los Olivos students signing in this year’s opening song of our Spring Sing! The students once again did a fantastic job. #lo_spartans

img.alt: Congratulations to Mrs. Blanchard and Mrs. Squires who were recognized as grant recipients at the Santa Barbara County Office of Education’s Education Celebration tonight! We are fortunate to have both of them at Los Olivos Elementary School! #lo_spartans
img.title: Congratulations to Mrs. Blanchard and Mrs. Squires who were recognized as grant recipients at the Santa Barbara County Office of Education’s Education Celebration tonight! We are fortunate to have both of them at Los Olivos Elementary School! #lo_spartans

img.alt: Shout out to our ASB students who are giving up their lunch time to write inspirational & encouraging notes to their fellow schoolmates for testing! #lo_spartans
img.title: Shout out to our ASB students who are giving up their lunch time to write inspirational & encouraging notes to their fellow schoolmates for testing! #lo_spartans

img.alt: Here are the other photos from Career Day today. Thank you again volunteers.#lo_spartans
img.title: Here are the other photos from Career Day today. Thank you again volunteers.#lo_spartans

img.alt: Thank you to our career day speakers for volunteering time out of their busy schedules to inspire our middle school students today! Your personal stories impacted the lives of our youth. #lo_spartans #partnersineducation
img.title: Thank you to our career day speakers for volunteering time out of their busy schedules to inspire our middle school students today! Your personal stories impacted the lives of our youth. #lo_spartans #partnersineducation

div.class: slide slide1 testimonial_rotator_slide hreview itemreviewed item has-image cf-tr

div.div: As President of the Los Olivos School Foundation, it is our charge to make sure we are providing the best enrichment programs and opportunities for our students. Digital Learning, Science, Life-Skills, Music, and Art are just a few of the programs that we support and provide to the student body. We have seen the students flourish with these programs and will continue to strive on keeping the school as a beacon for innovative learning and enrichment.

span.span: Jaime Dietenhofe, President of the Los Olivos School Foundation
Jaime Dietenhofe, President of the Los Olivos School Foundation

div.div: As President of the Los Olivos School Foundation, it is our charge to make sure we are providing the best enrichment programs and opportunities for our students. Digital Learning, Science, Life-Skills, Music, and Art are just a few of the programs that we support and …

div.class: slide slide2 testimonial_rotator_slide hreview itemreviewed item has-image cf-tr

img.alt: Photos of Student Work, paper flowers

div.div: Los Olivos School has been a warm and welcoming environment for our two children. The teachers and staff do a wonderful job paying attention to each child’s unique attributes. Reading and math incentive programs have propelled our children beyond grade level. The commitment of the school’s foundation fundraising efforts offers enrichment that rounds out their education. This is a public school with a private school feel.

img.alt: Photos of Student Work, paper flowers

div.div: Los Olivos School has been a warm and welcoming environment for our two children. The teachers and staff do a wonderful job paying attention to each child’s unique attributes. Reading and math incentive programs have propelled our children beyond grade level. The commitment of the …

div.class: slide slide3 testimonial_rotator_slide hreview itemreviewed item has-image cf-tr

div.div: The decision to move back to the town Los Olivos was strongly influenced by the fact that my children would be attending Los Olivos Elementary School. From the teacher quality to the challenging curriculum as well as the favorable student/teacher ratio, it is evident why this was chosen as a National Blue Ribbon School.

The decision to move back to the town Los Olivos was strongly influenced by the fact that my children would be attending Los Olivos Elementary School. From the teacher quality to the challenging curriculum as well as the favorable student/teacher ratio, it is evident why …

div.p: We welcome families to visit us at our annual Open House or come for a personal tour. Contact our office at (805) 688-4025 to schedule an appointment.

div.a: 2540 Alamo Pintado Ave. P.O. Box 208 Los Olivos, CA 93441
